## Some exciting projects I am working on:

\

* Beaver habitat modelling for Great Britain (GB)

* Predicting beaver dam distribution, density and capacity for GB

* Quantifying the impact of Beaver dams on Hydrology

* Mapping the population expansion of Beaver in the River Otter

* Modelling beaver territory carrying capacity of the River Otter

* Using Drone-based Structure from Motion (SfM) Photogrammetry to quantify the changes in ripaian vegetation
